title: New Samsung Food app can help you master the art of cooking right at home
description: Powered by AI technology, the app acts as your personal assistant by helping you find new recipes and create new ones.

title: Ransomware hackers target major Citrix NetScaler flaw

description: Duet AI is coming to multiple Google security tools to "supercharge security".

description: Get a glimpse of how the Meta Quest 3 is going to recognize objects around you and add them to mixed reality.

title: TCL’s new smartphones have paper-like displays to protect your eyes

description: Apple is expected to go USB-C for the iPhone and AirPods, but what about its Mac accessories?

title: This sneaky Android malware uses a rare technique to steal banking data
description: Through protobuf data serialization, Android malware can steal plenty of sensitive data, including real-time screen content.

title: Huawei quietly releases the Mate 60 and Mate 60 Pro, possibly its first 5G phones in years
description: Huawei's new flagship phones went on sale with little fanfare and 5G support. That's a pretty big deal.
